narrative.narrative: Helijet is a helicopter airline based at Vancouver,British Columbia. It has been around since 1986 and has scheduled service to 4 other airports in British Columbia and does a great deal of charter service to places like fishing lodges. It also caters to film,TV,tour guide,and industrial uses. It is also British Columbia's largest air medical service provider. It has also served Seattle's Boeing Field before. As of 2013 it had 10 Sikorsky S-76's,3 Bell 206 LongRangers,and an AS350. It has two Learjet 31 fixed wing planes but those are only used for medical flights. Its first helicopter in 1986 was a Bell 412 and it has had AS355 and S-61's in the past. Beechcraft 1900D fixed wing was also a past aircraft.
